articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Chinese delegation plans to travel to Washington to sign trade deal: SCMP
articles.description: A Chinese trade delegation is planning to travel to Washington on Jan. 13 for the signing of the U.S.-China Phase 1 trade deal, the South China Morning Post reported on Sunday citing a source briefed on the matter.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - A Chinese trade delegation is planning to travel to Washington on Jan. 13 for the signing of the U.S.-China Phase 1 trade deal, the South China Morning Post reported on Sunday citing a source briefed on the matter.

articles.author: Shilpa Jamkhandikar
articles.title: Indian government seeks to woo Bollywood stars as citizenship law protests rage on
articles.description: The Indian government invited numerous Bollywood stars and film industry personalities to a private gathering on Sunday in an effort to garner support for a new citizenship law that has triggered weeks of sometimes violent protests nationwide.
articles.content: MUMBAI (Reuters) - The Indian government invited numerous Bollywood stars and film industry personalities to a private gathering on Sunday in an effort to garner support for a new citizenship law that has triggered weeks of sometimes violent protests nationwi… [+2246 chars]
